articles.description: A drawing of a bear’s head by Italian Renaissance master Leonardo Da Vinci is expected to fetch up to $16.5 million at auction in London on Thursday.
articles.content:
LONDON A drawing by Italian Renaissance master Leonardo Da Vinci, one of the last to be sold, is expected to fetch $16 million when it's auctioned on Thursday.
Estimated to be more than 500 years ol… [+2271 chars]
